hero.title: Asterium Card: Pay your way, win big!
hero.subtitle: Sign up, use the Asterium card in everyday life, and get a chance to win 1 ETH!

footer.slogan: Crypto assets without fear. A legal platform with licensing and protection

prizes.title: Raffle Prizes
prizes.subtitle: One card — endless possibilities. Turn your everyday spending into an iPhone 17 Pro Max with the Asterium card

list.title: 1 ETH
list.description: We're not giving away an abstraction — we're giving a full unit of crypto asset (Google the price). This is an asset you can store, sell, or use for everyday purchases. It's not just a prize, it's the start of your new financial chapter.

list.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max
list.description: You take second place, but your smartphone will be first in awesomeness. iPhone 17 Pro Max — it's not just a phone, it's status, the most powerful camera for content, and the fastest processor for any task.

list.title: Asterium Merch Box
list.description: The merch box can't be bought — it can only be earned. Inside: collectible items with Asterium branding, created exclusively for winners. You get not just things, but a piece of our company philosophy and the status of someone who was among the best.

list.title: Visa Platinum + 100 HUMO each
list.description: A time-tested tool — Visa Platinum for daily spending and 100 HUMO tokens to your balance. Two sides of the same coin called “Modern Finance.” Manage both wisely.

list.title: 50 HUMO each
list.description: Every great journey starts with a single step, and every big portfolio starts with the first token. We're giving you not just 50 HUMO — we're giving you the beginning of your personal crypto story in the world of digital assets.

how.title: How to participate?
how.subtitle: Complete 4 simple steps and join the giveaway.

steps.title: Download the Asterium app or register via web version and open a wallet using promo code Etherium
Secure your account by completing KYC 1 and KYC 2
steps.desc: Verify your identity and protect your assets with 2FA (Google Authenticator)

steps.title: Order the physical Asterium Humo Daily card
steps.desc: Get your card directly in the app — fast, easy, and secure.

steps.title: Earn points with every purchase using Asterium HUMO Daily and for app reviews
steps.desc: Pay for goods and services across Uzbekistan via HUMO terminals with your Asterium HUMO Daily card — get points for every 1 USDT spent. +10 points for a review in Play Market or App Store.

items.title: 1 USDT = 1 point
items.desc: For every 1 USDT spent with the Asterium HUMO Daily card

items.title: +10 points
items.desc: For leaving a review on AppStore or Play Market

items.title: +50 points
items.desc: For every exchange at Asterium crypto exchanger (regardless of amount)
